Arrow: Your turn, Perplex.

Perplex went outside and picked up Windlord, bu=
t noticed Termitron as well.

Perplex: I think you'll be okay.

Perplex too=
k Windlord into a CR Chamber.

Perplex: Arrow, Termitron needs help, too.

=
Arrow: And it's my turn again, partner.

Arrow walks out and lifts Termitro=
n, taking him inside and into a CR Chamber, too. Arrow catches his breath, =
as Termitron was quite heavy.

Arrow: Got ripped off that time, I did...

 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 12:18 AM
  Subject: RE: Chivtr=
on Defense


  Windlord::

  Windlord tried to stood up and walk towards th=
e base but he fell in the ground, Termitron was near in stasis lock. Windlo=
rd opened his comm link in all Chivtrons's frecuencies "I... ne.. help... I=
 don't know ho... long I can... Stan"

  Windlord couldn't continue, but he=
 was conceus and he left opened his com link, in order to let other Chivtro=
ns find him.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
 =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 5:26 PM
    =
Subject: Re: Chivtron Defense


    The Maximals, Deemos, and McGowan's gro=
up should be far away by now.

    Burning Hammer: Aerotaur?

    Burning H=
ammer walked out and picked him up.

    Burning Hammer: How many?

    He =
carried Aerotaue inside and put him into a CR Chamber. My other 3 bots
    =
come in.

    Arrow: That battle was disgraceful. They got the jump on us, =
and they won
    this time! Ridiculous! The idea of those idiots beating us=
 is madness! All
    because I don't have command over the shields! I deman=
d to be able to
    control those shields, and I want it right now, or I'm =
taking Zeniith and
    leaving.

    Perplex: I also want to be able to com=
mand the ship, Arrow is right.

    Arrow patted Perplex on the back and pu=
t his arm around him.

    Burning Hammer: I think I also need that, or els=
e some of us may end up
    perishing in the next battle. I have to agree w=
ith them.

    Zeni: Can I have power over the shields?

    Arrow: If I ha=
ve power over them, then you have power over them, you really
    don't nee=
d it. Well? What's it going to be? I get my shield control, as does
    Per=
plex and Burning Hammer, or we leave...

    ----- Original Message -----
